events.name: QualityInspectionPerformed
events.description: Captures the event when a quality inspection is completed on a batch of products.

events.name: DefectiveItemsIdentified
events.description: Records when defective items are found during a quality inspection.

events.name: NonComplianceReported
events.description: Logs the event when non-compliance with quality standards is reported.

events.name: QualityReportGenerated
events.description: Indicates that a quality report has been generated based on inspections.

events.name: InspectionScheduleUpdated
events.description: Shows when the schedule for upcoming inspections is updated.

commands.name: PerformQualityInspection
commands.description: Captures the event when a quality inspection is completed on a batch of products.

commands.name: IdentifyDefectiveItems
commands.description: Records when defective items are found during a quality inspection.

commands.name: ReportNonCompliance
commands.description: Logs the event when non-compliance with quality standards is reported.

commands.name: GenerateQualityReport
commands.description: Indicates that a quality report has been generated based on inspections.

commands.name: UpdateInspectionSchedule
commands.description: Shows when the schedule for upcoming inspections is updated.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration is needed to check inventory levels affected by quality inspections.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration required to communicate defects back to suppliers.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integration to pass quality reports to external reporting systems.

integrationPoints.name: FeedbackLoop
integrationPoints.description: Integration to enable feedback based on quality reports for continuous improvement.
